short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily adjust the brightness levels of any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lumie is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by giving you precise control over website brightness. With Lumie, you can easily adjust the brightness levels of any website, ensuring optimal visibility and reducing eye strain, especially during late-night browsing sessions. Whether you prefer a dimmer display for a more comfortable reading environment or need to brighten up a page with a single click, Lumie provides a seamless solution, empowering you to customize your online environment to suit your preferences. Enjoy a personalized and visually comfortable web browsing experience with Lumie.
